tool_description: Calculates travel distances and estimated travel times between technician locations and service request locations using road network routing.

technician_locations.description: Technician locations as addresses or coordinates

service_location.description: Service request location as address or coordinates

include_traffic.description: Whether to include current traffic conditions

departure_time.description: Planned departure time for traffic calculation

error_messages: Invalid location format: Locations must be valid addresses or coordinate pairs (latitude,longitude).
Geocoding failed: Unable to resolve one or more location addresses. Verify address accuracy.
Invalid travel mode: Use one of [driving, walking, cycling].
Routing service unavailable: Unable to calculate routes. Check network connectivity and try again.
Too many locations: Maximum 50 technician locations allowed per calculation.
usage: Provide technician_locations array and service_location. Optionally specify travel_mode, include_traffic flag, and departure_time for more accurate routing calculations.

distances_km.description: Travel distances in kilometers for each technician

travel_times_minutes.description: Estimated travel times in minutes for each technician

closest_technician_index.description: Array index of the closest technician

traffic_delays_minutes.description: Additional delay due to traffic conditions
